0.2.name: wordpress/floating-social-media-buttons
0.2.description: The Social Float plugin displays the facebook share button ,the official twitter retweet button ,google buzz and the digg button for your viewes on a floating bar, like the websites mashable and cracked.com. There is also conditional tags settings to place the bar on any page that you want, and an option for developers to hardcode the location of the plugin. View Demo here
